RelatedSentence: The first two were infected in Saudi Arabia and then traveled to the United States .
The latest case was reported in Illinois and doctors say it was likely spread with just a handshake .
In the latest case , authorities say the person infected had two business meetings with a person who recently returned from Saudi Arabia .
